states.label: s1
states.msg: Greetings, stranger. You look like you have travelled a great distance to get here.

transitions.trigger: Hold on there... this is a cyberpunk game, not a fantasy game. You should've called me 'chummer' or something.

states.label: s2
states.msg: Fair enough. Yolo, chummer. I can see you've been hacking the intertubes for gigaparsecs.

transitions.trigger: Much better, thank you. Now can you explain what all of this is about?

states.label: s3
states.msg: I am a mysterious stranger... I could be anyone, or anything, you want me to be. The only limit is your imagination.

transitions.trigger: Sounds like you are the beginnings of a generic NPC class, designed to be flexible yet powerful.

states.label: s4
states.msg: This is a tech demo using the pyved-engine

states.label: s5
states.msg: Actually I'm just a generic isometric map object right now. But yeah, that is pretty flexible and powerful.

transitions.trigger: Well, it was nice talking to you. I'll see you around.

states.label: s6
states.msg: I could be a dog, a character, a computer terminal. Anything you need for the game.

states.label: s7
states.msg: That's the spirit. Keep that in mind until the inventory system and combat get worked out.

states.label: s8
states.msg: Of course you will. I'm the only entity besides you on this map.

states.label: s9
states.msg: [You stand before a friendly-looking Samoyed dog. For some reason, it is wearing a wizard robe and has glowing eyes.]

states.label: s10
states.msg: Well, that's the point. This code is just a starting point; bricks from which games can be created.

states.label: s11
states.msg: Achievement unlocked: It is possible to pet the dog in this tech demo!
